MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone, affecting properties in Castle Avenue and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.46pm. Our engineers have arrived at the Auchenlodment substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:23PM on Sunday 14 February 2021.
